item.title: Train Sim World® 6: Amtrak's Acela®（新規追加）
item.description: America’s Fastest Train! Race along Northeast Corridor rails in iconic style, reaching incredible speeds through multiple states and suburbs. “Train approaching, please remain behind yellow line”, Amtrak’s Acela® blasts into Train Sim World®!
item.content:encoded:
America’s Fastest Train! Race along Northeast Corridor rails in iconic style, reaching incredible speeds through multiple states and suburbs. “Train approaching, please remain behind yellow line”, Amtrak’s Acela® blasts into Train Sim World®!

item.description: Embark on varied passenger services along the scenic Pfälzische Ludwigsbahn in Train Sim World®! From local S-Bahn to meandering ICE traffic, enjoy a mixed pace on the rails between Kaiserslautern and the busy hub of Mannheim.

item.description: From Piccadilly station to the modern airport terminus, multiple lines combine to serve Greater Manchester commuters aboard Northern Trains traction. Experience a variety of services with Alan Thomson Simulation’s first route in Train Sim World®.

item.title: Sinking Eternity（新規追加）
item.description: Sinking Eternity is a single-player underwater exploration RPG. Survive extreme depths, hide from dangerous sea creatures, and uncover the secrets of a civilization lost for millennia.

item.title: Train Sim World® 6: BR Heavy Freight Pack Loco Add-On（新規追加）
item.description: The BR Heavy Freight Pack brings together two icons of British Motive Power, the Class 40, one of the first mass produced diesel loco classes, and the Class 08, one of the most seen locos on the network. This double-loco pack brings heavy freight operations to the Northern Trans-Pennine route.

The BR Heavy Freight Pack brings together two icons of British Motive Power, the Class 40, one of the first mass produced diesel loco classes, and the Class 08, one of the most seen locos on the network. This double-loco pack brings heavy freight operations to the Northern Trans-Pennine route.

item.title: Train Sim World® 6: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf（新規追加）
item.description: Experience the joy of the festive season with Train Sim World®: The Holiday Express - Runaway Elf; drive a model locomotive around a nostalgic 1980s living room and complete unique challenges before Christmas Morning arrives! Can you stop the mischievous Elf from ruining the big day?

item.description: A classic loco dating back to the 1970s and Deutsche Reichsbahn’s answer to the growing freight and passenger railways in Germany. The DB BR 155, or “Electric Container” as it’s affectionately known by railfans, has stood the test of time.

item.title: Train Sim World® 6: DB BR 204 Add-On（新規追加）
item.description: The DB BR 204 was a double-ended loco with the cab in the middle, allowing for seamless operation in either direction. 860 of these would be built, and they were put to use on freight traffic throughout Germany. Experience the classic DB BR 204 for yourself in Train Sim World®!
